original_text: and the devil who had deceived them was thrown into the lake of fire and sulfur where the beast and the false prophet were, and they will be tormented day and night forever and ever.
korean_text: 또 그들을 미혹하는 마귀가 불과 유황 못에 던져지니 거기는 그 짐승과 거짓 선지자도 있어 세세토록 밤낮 괴로움을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: and the devil who had deceived them
was thrown into the lake of fire and sulfur
where the beast and the false prophet were
day and night forever and ever
